markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Xulgath Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=418)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Xulgath warriors strike with fury and eager cruelty, always ready for the next fight. The taking of prizes from battle—including weapons and items stolen from defeated foes along with grislier trophies harvested from fallen victims’ flesh—is a popular pursuit among these vicious reptiles, and those whose armor and scales are most adorned are awarded the greatest respect (and perhaps fear) from their kin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Xulgath_XulgathWarrior.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Xulgath Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=418)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 336</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3), [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 21

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 16 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is sickened 1, and on a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths’ stenches for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +9,
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9,
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +7 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +7 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-102" />
name: Xulgath Warrior
